summary.label:
Приложение находит ошибки, допущенные в коэффициентах букмекерами СНГ и, если такой коэффициент считается выгодным, предлагает совершить ставку, оповещая нотификацией.

КАК ЭТО РАБОТАЕТ:
Ошибки в коэффициентах обнаруживаются путем сравнения с мировыми эталонными букмекерами и обрабатываются алгоритмами со специально обученным искусственным интеллектом.
Круглосуточно на нашем сервере идет сравнение миллионов коэффициентов и если какой-то букмекер СНГ предлагает ставку по коэффициенту существенно выше, чем несколько топовых букмекеров, то очевидно, что именно этот букмекер ошибается, так как для мировых букмекеров подобная ошибка будет стоить миллионы долларов и они намного точнее оценивают события.
По всем предложенным ставкам ведется история и статистика, чтобы можно было отследить доходность стратегии и честность трекинга всех ставок без исключения.

ПОЧЕМУ ЭТО РАБОТАЕТ:
С математической точки зрения если постоянно ставить на, пусть даже не сильно, завышенные коэффициенты, то со временем обязательно будет плюсовой доход.

box-to-box is the most effective soccer training app! 


It includes a virtual soccer coach and gives you access to professional soccer training content and personalised training plans used by Champions League soccer stars. 


box-to-box is a smart, fun, and easy way to improve your soccer skills with freestyle soccer training for all ages and experience levels. These training sessions were designed by professional trainers and are divided into eight training categories with video tutorials explaining how you can practice like the champions!


Features:
- Train like the pros: box-to-box has plenty of soccer training videos designed by Champions League trainers. You can watch those drills and track your performance for free. 
- Borussia Dortmund DLC: Improve your training sessions with Jadon Sancho, Marco Reus, Jude Bellingham, or Youssoufa Moukoko! The Borussia Dortmund DLC has 42 exclusive training drills, where you can watch the Champions League pros in action and note down some tips for your football career! 
- Virtual Coach: Get smart training plans adapted to your position, experience, weight, and goals. Also track your burned calories, distanced covered, and other stats while you improve your ball control, footwork, juggling skills, or the free kick taking.
- Training categories: box-to-box provides you with more than 200 smart training drills for warmup, shooting, passing, dribbling, panna, physical exercise, pace, coordination and juggling.  
- Scorecard: You have your own Player Scorecard and you can upload your drill performances to improve it. At box-to-box you are part of a global soccer community where you can benchmark yourself with your friends and role models. 
- Leaderboards: The Leaderboard will show you who are the current best kickers. You can also check your Stats and decide which soccer skills or training categories to improve, and how many points you still need to collect to get to the next level. 


Your soccer coach is not helping out as much as you wanted? Do you want to get new skills? Coaching tips? 
A warmup drill tutorial maybe? An easy juggling exercise? Want to get better at shooting that curved free kick? 


We have the solution. Our UEFA Pro Licence and athletic trainers have designed the best soccer training drills to help you improve your skills. We believe every soccer player should have access to professional soccer training.


We keep track of your soccer skills in your Scorecard and make all your training drill statistics available so you can compare yourself with the box-to-box soccer community. New training drills, tips, and trophies can be unlocked by improving your skills. Every kicker is now one step closer to his dream of starting a professional soccer career!


With box-to-box, you will improve:
- Warmup: Improving your footwork or the ball control sounds funnier, but the warmup is important and box-to-box will be your coach from the beginning of your training sessions.
- Footwork: besides the warmup, you need great movements to be a soccer star. That’s why physical, coordination, and pace drills are an important part of your training. 
- Ball Control: a good relationship with the ball is essential for shooting, passing, and dribbling like a pro. From an amazing free kick, a dreamlike assist or juggling, our smart coaching tips will get you covered!


Never underestimate the power of having fun while training: soccer stars like Cristiano Ronaldo and Zlatan Ibrahimovic are proof of how important is to practice soccer with passion while having fun.


Make sure you start practicing your soccer skills and free kicks now! We are in close contact with professional soccer clubs and players to make this happen and support you! You can now have your own soccer coach in your pocket!

AlmatyBike is an element of the urban infrastructure. 
AlmatyBike is a full-fledged form of urban public transport and provides residents and visitors the opportunity to make short trips from point A to point B.
The bike rental is mainly used as last mile transportation (e.g., from the transportation hub to the destination and back, etc.). 

As an additional means of public transportation, AlmatyBike is the most affordable today - a standard annual pass costs 10,000 tenge. Discounts on discounted tickets for pensioners, students and people with disabilities amount to 50%. At the same time, the first 30 minutes of each ride are free, i.e. by returning the bike to the station every half hour, the user can make all rides virtually free of charge.
